name: Michael OKeefe
text: The lunch buffet is fantastic. They have all you can eat Pizza and salad. If you are going early be careful because they don't cook the first Pizza until they have a customer. Plan your time accordingly

name: Austin
text: The pizza was just as you'd expect if you have ever had pizza hut. This pizza hut just seems to take a long time and have rude employees. I ordered for pick up, and when i went in, every one seemed to ignore me. I asked someone for help, …More

text: Just offensive. The lowest form of human beings serving you food. Literally walked in while only one table was being serviced, Had two workers walk right by me like i wasn't standing right in front of them... During this wait, I noticed a …More

text: My husband and I came here for lunch and were in for a surprise, as we came in it smelled like pure garlic, we still agreed to stay and eat, as we looked over the menu we were surprised they didn't have much, only pizza and chicken wings …More

text: The WORST, WORST, WORST Pizza Hut on the planet! Do not go here.  Rude, ong orders (and I'm talking completely wrong not a little wrong!). Found hair on chicken wings tried to show so-called "manager", he said "What do you want me to do?"! …More

text: Service was terrible, hostes seemed to have a bad acctitude!! The pizza was ok but i don't want to came again for the service!!!

name: Jessica Davenport
text: Best pizza hut I have ever been to, the service was very good and the buffet was fresh and clean!

name: Torni 3945
text: Robert Morales is a piss poor manager that is running the business to the ground. I won't be surprise to see Pizza Hut out business like he ran the Arby's in Wappingers out of business.

text: We couldn't even sit down. The interior of the restaurant smelled so bad we couldn't stomach staying there. Absolutely disgusting!!

text: They don't deliver. How can a Pizza Hut not deliver? No one wants to go eat inside a Pizza Hut.
